name: BugCapture
summary: BugCapture creates screencasts of your iOS testing sessions.
description:
While testing an app, BugCapture records the content of your screen. If an bug occures, the tester can access the BugCapture menu by taking a screenshot. There they can easily replay the video of their testing sessions and share it with the developers.

You need an key for this Pod! Mail to info@appdafuer.com to get one.
